divs: sighting detailsi came out of a bar for some fresh air and looked up in the sky (east of 43rd ave\ dunlap-olive��� sunday evening ��� was not drinking!! ) in the distance far far away, a bright white cross appeared from no where, over the mountains. from the crossing points of the cross, a projectile shot out and headed in my direction, west by southwest. note: once the projectile left the bright white cross, the cross itself minimized it self and disappeared. the ball shaped object soared above me no higher then like at an air show. it looked moon shaped with dark and light craters. would say it was approx. a 20 foot diameter. flames were shooting out the entire backside. it was silent, no noise. lost site of it going over the buildings on dunlap. i ran to the north side of the building and looked westward but could not see where the object had gone.
Summary: apperance if white cross/ 20 foot projectile shot out of it/ then white cross shrunk and disappeared
trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Glendale
There were 2 other sightings in Glendale on or around July 10th 1995
